item.title: (Talk) Glimpse into Algorithms
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: This is a talk presented to high-school students during SMTB-2020. Quick numerical illustrations for runtime, correctness and such fun things.

item.title: Text and derive - getting notifications from the cluster
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: How to get notifications from a remote machine with Telegram. A really simple and universal approach.

item.title: A mind-map for (some) basic OR topics
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: An attempt to summarize some key OR concepts, inspired by the IE/OR Qualifying exams scope in 2019. Designed as an easy-to-overview mindmap.

item.title: An Euler diagram for convexity generalizations
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: On convexity generalization concepts (quasiconvexity and such) – a one-pager with examples.

item.title: Dotplot sample generation utility
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: A tiny dot-plot generation utility in R

item.title: A disclaimer
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: This is my personal website, which may or may not be updated, or completely changed frequently. I have done my best to ensure that the information presented here is correct and relevant. However: I am a human being, I can be wrong. Or can just don’t know something important. This happens quite often, and it can (and will) affect the materials I present here. Therefore, no warranty is provided or implied, including (but not limited to) any warranty of merchantability, correctness, or fitness for a particular purpose.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.author: web@bochkarev.io (Alexey A. Bochkarev)
item.description: This is a private site hosting mostly my notes on various topics (which are mostly of interest to myself, perhaps), so I do not inherently need any users’ data. Therefore, while I am definitely not an expert on how the underlying technologies work, I do take deliberate efforts to maximize the privacy of this website. To the best of my knowledge, it “interacts” with your data in a very minimalist fashion (if at all), as described below.
